Release Notes - Apache Phoenix Incubator - Version 2.2.3

  * PHOENIX-72 SkipScanFilter intersect may be incorrect
  * PHOENIX-45 Verify license compliance using Apache Rat. Add missing ASF license headers to source and remove
  * PHOENIX-25 Remove @author tag
  * Upgrade Phoenix coprocessors
  * Delay compat check if upgrading to Apache Phoenix
  * Backport optimizer fix for point lookups and order
  * Backport fix for PHOENIX-20: Single Key(s) not recognized by optimizer when table is salted
  * Adding UPPER, LOWER, and MD5 built-in functions
